text: Dmitri Andreyevich Arapov (; born 9 June 1993) is a Russian professional football goalkeeper. He plays for FC Tom Tomsk. ==Club career== He made his professional debut on 23 May 2015 for FC Ural Sverdlovsk Oblast in a Russian Football Premier League game against FC Torpedo Moscow when the first-choice Ural goalkeeper Nikolai Zabolotny was sent off for a professional foul. He started in Ural's next league game on 30 May 2015 against FC Terek Grozny as Zabolotny received an automatic one-game suspension for the sending off. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|Cup !colspan=2|Continental !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=8|FC Ural Yekaterinburg |2011–12 |rowspan=2|FNL |0||0||0||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||0||0 |- |2012–13 |0||0||0||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||0||0 |- |2013–14 |rowspan=5|Russian Premier League |0||0||0||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||0||0 |- |2014–15 |2||0||0||0||colspan=2|–||2||0||4||0 |- |2015–16 |9||0||2||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||11||0 |- |2016–17 |7||0||1||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||8||0 |- |2017–18 |0||0||1||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||1||0 |- !colspan=2|Total !18!!0!!4!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0!!24!!0 |- |FC Ural-2 Yekaterinburg |2017–18 |PFL |3||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||3||0 |- |FC Volgar Astrakhan |2017–18 |FNL |8||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||8||0 |- !colspan=3|Career total !29!!0!!4!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0!!35!!0 |- |} ===Notes=== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:People from Kushva Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:FC Ural Yekaterinburg players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Volgar Astrakhan players Category:FC Tom Tomsk players
